summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GST Reports Module (Phase 5) including all report types (GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, HSN Summary, ITC Reconciliation) with both backend API and frontend UI testing. All core functionality working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Date validation for invalid date format returns 500 instead of expected 422
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect core functionality, just error handling

passed_tests: GSTR-1 report generation with B2B/B2C breakdown
HSN-wise summary report generation and aggregation
GSTR-3B monthly summary with outward/inward supplies
ITC reconciliation report with tax calculations
Frontend login and navigation to GST Reports page
Date range input validation and filling
All data-testid attributes present for testing

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all core GST Reports UI functionality working)
